trans-unit.source: Terminates the running workflow instance, raises the <see cref="P:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed" /> event in the host, and reports error information.
trans-unit.target: Encerra a instância de fluxo de trabalho em execução, dispara o evento <see cref="P:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed" /> no host e relata informações de erro.

trans-unit.source: Once the workflow is terminated, it cannot be resumed.
trans-unit.target: Depois que o fluxo de trabalho é encerrado, ela não pode ser retomada.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exception that provoked the instance termination.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a exceção que provoked o encerramento de instância.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: A exceção que é passada para <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> é um <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> se apenas <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> está definido.

trans-unit.source: If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se apenas <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> for definido, que a exceção é transmitida para <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se ambos os <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> são definidos, um <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> é passado com especificado <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> é definido como a exceção <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
trans-unit.target: Se não for definido, um padrão <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> é criado.

trans-unit.source: A string input argument with the reason for the workflow instance termination.
trans-unit.target: Um argumento de entrada da cadeia de caracteres com o motivo para a terminação de instância de fluxo de trabalho.
O motivo do término do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: A exceção que é passada para <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> é um <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> se apenas <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> está definido.

trans-unit.source: If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se apenas <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> for definido, que a exceção é transmitida para <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se ambos os <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> são definidos, um <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> é passado com especificado <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, e <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> é definido como a exceção <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
trans-unit.target: Se não for definido, um padrão <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> é criado.
